Web USB send to browser

dev board RobotDyn M0 mini
firmware Arduino
chip SAMD21
features WebUSB

Before starting

Dependancies

Ensure the following dependancies are downloaded and available:
  • WebUSB Compatible Arduino hardware

Pre-requisites

Try these simpler or similar examples:
  1. Web USB detect

Code

Download code webusb-send.ino

Makefile

Description

Send a simple sentence from the MCU to the browser on laptop.

Start the web browser code with make server.

Ensure the browser side of the code is also implemented with serial.js.

Download code

References

  1. Access USB Devices on the Web
  2. List of USB IDs
  3. List of compatible arduino hardware
  4. Web USB demo
  5. Web USB serial.js
